Name: Hunger in Paradise
About the game: This is a casual game about Paradise - island where people are always starving. You play as a little girl who loves chopping trees and believe in shiny future of Paradise where every people would be happy! Show them how strong you believe in it! - Collect letters to make beautiful words - Save as much lives as you can - Make Paradise great again! - Unlock new skins and girls Use A D to move and Left mouse button to catch letters.
